cutscene.cellien.serval.save.2: * Uh... Don't worry!&* I'm going to take you&  someplace!
cutscene.serval.greet.0: * Oh dear, I'm glad you're&  awake!
cutscene.serval.greet.1: * I was really worried&  when I noticed you for&  the first time!
cutscene.serval.greet.2: * Severely hurt, left numb&  for hours after what had&  been accomplished...
cutscene.serval.greet.3: * I hope you're feeling&  recovered at this point,&  honestly.
cutscene.serval.greet.4: * Ah, it just feels like&  a miracle knowing&  you're all fine!
cutscene.serval.greet.5: * I'm Serval! And this is&  my territory.
cutscene.serval.greet.6: * If you don't mind me&  asking, do you have a&  regular territory?
cutscene.serval.greet.7: * It's just I haven't&  seen a "FRIEND" like&  you, that's all!
cutscene.serval.greet.8: * You don't know? That's&  okay. Do you know what&  kind of FRIEND you are?
cutscene.serval.greet.9: * Well, that's unusual.&* A FRIEND who doesn't&  know their type?
cutscene.serval.greet.10: * Oh, there was just that&  {color_text `yellow`}SANDSTAR{color_text `white`} eruption!
cutscene.serval.greet.11: * Tell you what! {color_text `yellow`}JAPARI&  LIBRARY{color_text `white`} exists and I can&  guide you to the gate.
cutscene.serval.greet.13: * Kaban-Chan!{w} For now,&  does it sound good?
cutscene.serval.greet.14: * I named it after the&  bag you were carrying.
cutscene.serval.greet.15: * That could be a clue...&  of your heritage,&  perhaps?
cutscene.serval.greet.16: * Let's go! This is going&  to be ameowzing!
cutscene.serval.new_friend.1: * Over that spot is&  another FRIEND!&* Plains Zebra-chan!
cutscene.serval.new_friend.2: * She is one of the many&  people whose territory&  is shared here.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.3: * And I don't know many&  here who'd want you to&  be hurt again.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.4: * Since she's a bit&  shy, Iâ€™d advise you&  not to frighten her.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.5: * If she is, tell her it's&  okay! Why not try to&  have a conversation?
cutscene.serval.new_friend.6: * I mean, I'm confident&  she'll loosen her&  shyness towards you!
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.0: * Oh, you... want&  to simply go away?
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.1: * Maybe you're a shy&  FRIEND then. I do&  understand your concern.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.2: * Hey, cheer up!&* I'm sure you're good&  at other things!
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.3: * My friends say&  I'm a bit clumsy and&  all, but...
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.4: * They also tell&  me that I'm a huge&  help to the Savannah.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.5: * Ultimately everyone&  has a good side and&  a bad side, so...
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.6: * You'll definitely&  learn about your&  powerful side.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.7: * I-I can help try to have&  a nice conversation to lighten&  her mood up.
cutscene.serval.new_friend.walk_away.8: * Meow! That's wonderful!&* Say, Kaban-chan, are&  you OK with this?
cutscene.serval.post_convo.0: * You had quite a decent&  conversation there!
cutscene.serval.post_convo.1: * I wouldn't know, really,&  {color_text `blue`}Lulu-chan{color_text `white`} appeared while&  you were gone!
cutscene.serval.post_convo.2: * I was hoping you two&  could meet, then she&  hurriedly hopped away!
cutscene.serval.post_convo.3: * While she still should&  be around, this does&  have me thinking...
cutscene.serval.post_convo.4: * Thinking about how I&  had to get you to&  the Japari Library.
cutscene.serval.post_convo.5: * So, yeah!{w}&* Let's get hopping when&  you're ready!
cutscene.serval.caveline.0: * This way!{w}&* You aren't scared of&  heights, are you?
cutscene.serval.caveline.1: * I just want to make sure.&&   {choice 0}...No     {choice 1}I don't know
cutscene.serval.caveline.1.0: * Ah, that's nice to&  hear, then.&* Let's go!
cutscene.serval.caveline.1.1.0: * Hmm...{w} Well don't worry&  about it, just hold my&  hand!
cutscene.serval.caveline.3: * Now repeat what I&  did!{w}&* You can do it!
cutscene.serval.caveline.3.0: * Heeey, I can't see you&  over here...!{w}&* Don't go away!
cutscene.serval.caveline.3.1: * (Maybe I shouldn't go&  farther from Serval&  too much.)
cutscene.serval.caveline.5: * Phew, glad it's fine.{w}&* I'll be more careful&  next time.
cutscene.serval.caveline.6: * Let's go through this&  cracked path.
cutscene.serval.caveline.miniboss.0: * Looks like we've got&  some company here!
cutscene.serval.caveline.miniboss.1: * Kaban, find a place&  to hide!
cutscene.serval.caveline.miniboss.2: * !?{w}{face_emotion 6} Have you already&  forgotten how you were&  wounded back there!?
cutscene.serval.caveline.miniboss.3: * Fine, so be it.&{face_emotion 3}{w}* Please be careful.
cutscene.serval.mountain.1: * I've heard this mountain&  produces "SANDSTAR"&  in mass around a decade.
cutscene.serval.mountain.2: * It's a pretty weird fact,&  I'd convey.
cutscene.serval.mountain.3: * And this latest one,&  as I've stated this&  previously...
cutscene.serval.mountain.4: * ...very well could've&  been how you're made?
cutscene.serval.mountain.5: * I myself am from the&  past few recent short&  eruption cycles.
cutscene.serval.mountain.6: * Now I'm... I'm beginning&  to worry about the&  CELLIEN outbreak.
cutscene.savannah.lake.0: * The water looks so magical the&  the thought of not taking&  a sip... I cannot tolerate.
cutscene.savannah.lake.1: * Who's there~?{w}&* And what're you up to~?{w}&* Oh, now I remember...
cutscene.savannah.lake.2: * Threathening the safety of&  the watering hole, I&  discern?
cutscene.savannah.lake.5: * She's my friend, not&  whatever idea you got?
cutscene.savannah.lake.6: * Ooh!{w}&* A companion of yours, I discern?{w}&* Then she must be...
cutscene.savannah.lake.8: * I'm sorry, was I too&  harsh to both of you?
cutscene.savannah.lake.9: * With what little you&  knew, not really. It&  was honestly still irking.
cutscene.savannah.lake.11: * Anyways, I was going&  to ask you why you&  put KABAN in such fear.
cutscene.savannah.lake.12: * Those little creatures&  were bothering me off, thus&  I wasn't morally fine.
cutscene.savannah.lake.13: * Though look out for the&  huge CELLIEN halting&  the gate.
cutscene.savannah.lake.14: * You two aren't strong&  enough to beat it anyway!
cutscene.savannah.lake.15: * Then why not do it&  yourself?
cutscene.savannah.lake.16: * I've got more important&  things to do...
cutscene.savannah.lake.18: * Anyways, we've got&  things to do as well!
cutscene.savannah.lake.19: * Don't you think your&  little "companion" needs&  to take cover?
cutscene.savannah.lake.21: * It seems you've forgotten&  the rules of Japari Park&  as well!
cutscene.savannah.lake.23: * S-she is more capable&  than you think!
cutscene.savannah.lake.24: * Well then.{w}&* We'll see what this&  companion has got!
cutscene.savannah.lake.25: * So, are you able to swim?
cutscene.savannah.lake.30: * She's not someone who's&  trustworthy by any means,&  Serval.
cutscene.savannah.lake.31: * You wouldn't want to leave&  a child like this alone&  in a conflict, would you?
cutscene.savannah.lake.32: * And thus, why don't I teach&  you two how to sprint?
cutscene.savannah.lake.34: * Laziness won't work in a&  situation like this, Serval.{w}&* It is important.
cutscene.savannah.lake.36: * Well then!&* Get ready for a minute-long&  lesson!
cutscene.savannah.lake.37: * I eagerly listened to Hippo's&  words and learned something&  new as a result.
cutscene.savannah.lake.38: * This technique will surely&  boost my skills in a fight.
cutscene.savannah.lake.41: * I mean, at least Kaban&  knows something valuable&  now.
cutscene.savannah.lake.42: * You don't have to be biased&  for that little advice, &  you know.
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.0: * What do you think&  you're doing?!
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.1: * Are you aware of how&  dangerous that creature&  is?
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.2: * Look, listen to what&  Hippo-chan said.
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.3: * I know she's annoying&  and that she talks&  in a weird way...
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.4: * But she's isn't actually&  wrong or anything,&  she's just...
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.6: * But that CELLIEN is what&  worries me the most.
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.7: * I swear I still&  remember the folk living&  here like yesterday...
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.8: * But now they need my&  help.
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.9: * I know it's hard to beat&  the CELLIEN and all,&  but...
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.10: * You see, Kaban. &* If I'm stuttering like&  that...
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.11: * Who knows what it'd do&  to you?
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.12: * So, leave the job to me.&&   {choice 0}Yes             {choice 1}No
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.co: * I knew you'd&  understand me, KABAN.
* Now quick!{w}&* Go back to the&  lake!
cutscene.savannah.bridge.before_fight.de: * You've{w} GOT{w} to go back&  near Hippo and&  take shelter!
* Don't say I didn't&  warn you.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.0: * Hey, thanks for the&  huge help a while ago.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.1: * It might've been&  impossible without you.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.2: * So, this is the time&  we seperate our ways,&  right?
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.3: * I'm going to miss you&  so much.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.4: * Considering the fact&  we've spent so much&  time together...
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.5: * To tell the truth, I'm&  craving to come&  with you, but I can't.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.6: * But it's all alright!{w}&* There is nothing for&  me to worry about!
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.7: * Please do me a favor,&  will you?
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.8: * Do NOT lose the hat&  no matter what happens.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.9: * It's a reminant from&  someone very important&  in this world.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.10: * Even if you're in&  trouble, this hat will&  save you from dangers.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.13: * Now I just have to&  go.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.14: * I'm sure we can meet&  again sometime.
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.15: * Eh...?{w}&* The owner of the hat?
cutscene.savannah.post_battle.16: * It's from someone&  very important in this&  world.
